command.name: install
command.summary: Install a package. Use plugin-install to install plugins

option.name: force
option.doc: Force the installation to proceed independent of errors

argument.name: package
argument.doc: package.xml, local package archive, remove package archive, or abstract package.

command.doc:
Installs listed packages.
local package.xml example: php pyrus.phar install package.xml
local package archive example: php pyrus.phar install PackageName-1.2.0.tar
remote package archive example: php pyrus.phar install http://www.example.com/PackageName-1.2.0.tgz
Examples of an abstract package: php pyrus.phar install PackageName installs PackageName from the default channel with stability preferred_state php pyrus.phar pear/PackageName installs PackageName from the pear.php.net channel with stability preferred_state php pyrus.phar install channel://doc.php.net/PackageName installs PackageName from the doc.php.net channel with stability preferred_state php pyrus.phar install PackageName-beta installs PackageName from the default channel, beta or stable stability php pyrus.phar install PackageName-1.2.0 installs PackageName from the default channel, version 1.2.0
